title: Tappeh Graziani
description: Small settlement located approximately 10km southeast of Shahr-i Sokhta in the Sistan Plain, eastern Iran, inhabited from the first half of the 3rd millennium BCE until approximately 2350 BCE.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate Google Earth location of the Tappeh Graziani site, after Kavosh 2019.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Tappeh Graziani
